column5: Heading up to Lac Seul this weekend. Staying at Mahkwa lodge out of Hudson. Anyone been up there recently? Wondering what the water levels and temps are.
Jeremy Plan on fishing walleye primarily, may take a shot at some smallmouth also. Seen a couple big muskies last year following the walleyes to the boat.
Did you have good results for walleyes, smallies and muskies? Did Mahkwa have their drive-in road open? Thanks, JDP
